article: Fiona Famous was a very popular girl at school. She felt  _  as no other girl had so many friends at school and in the neighborhood. But everything  _  on National Friendship Day. On that day in class everyone had to make three presents to give to their three best friends. Fiona  _  the task of choosing three from all the dozens of her friends. However, she was the only one in her class who did not  _  a present! She felt terrible, and spent hours  _  . Everyone came and comforted her for a while.But each one only stayed for a short time before leaving.This was  _  what Fiona had done so many times to others. She  _  that she was a good companion and acquaintance , but she had not been a true friend to anyone. She had tried to be close to everyone, but now she found that was not enough to create  _  friendships. When she got home that night, Fiona told her mother about the whole thing. Her mother said, "You can't be a close friend to everybody.It's only  _  to have a few true friends.The others will just be playmates or acquaintances." Hearing this, Fiona decided to change her way so that she could finally have some true friends. That night, in  _  , she thought about what she could do to get them. She thought about her mother. Her mother was always willing to  _  her, she put up with all of Fiona's dislikes and  _  , she always forgave her, she loved her a great deal ... That was what makes a  _  ! And Fiona  _  , realizing that she already had the best friend that anyone could  _  .She fell asleep and had a good dream.
